name: kcmillersean_billboard-hot-100-1958-2017
title: Billboard Hot weekly charts
description:
Weekly Hot 100 singles chart between 8/2/1958 and 12/28/2018

This dataset contains every weekly Hot 100 singles chart from Billboard.com. Each row of data represents a song and the corresponding position on that week's chart. Included in each row are the following elements:
- Billboard Chart URL
- WeekID
- Song name
- Performer name
- SongID - Concatenation of song & performer
- Current week on chart
- Instance (this is used to separate breaks on the chart for a given song. Example, an instance of 6 tells you that this is the sixth time this song has appeared on the chart)
- Previous week position
- Peak Position (as of the corresponding week)
- Weeks on Chart (as of the corresponding week)

fields.name: instance
fields.title: Instance
fields.description: Number of times a songID has appeared on chart after dropping off the chart for at least 1 week.

fields.name: previous_week_position
fields.title: Previous Week Position
fields.description: previous chart position for a song  for that week

fields.name: peak_position
fields.title: Peak Position
fields.description: highest position for a songid for that given week. IT IS NOT THE OVERALL HIGHEST POSITION

fields.name: weeks_on_chart
fields.title: Weeks on Chart
fields.description: number of weeks on the chart for a songID for that given week. IT IS NOT THE OVERALL RUNNING COUNT OF WEEKS
